content:
Sure! Here are some popular solid-colored dresses for summer weddings:

1. A flowy maxi dress in a pastel color, such as blush or mint green
2. A bright yellow or orange knee-length dress with a fitted bodice and flared skirt
3. A classic navy blue or black slip dress with a V-neckline
4. A feminine, coral-colored wrap dress with ruffled details
5. A sky blue or light green midi dress with a sweetheart neckline and fitted waist
6. A sleek, emerald green halter-neck dress with a high slit
7. A simple, yet elegant white or cream-colored sheath dress with cap sleeves.
